page.title: 10Llanfihangel to Capel Seion
page.content: Ther is regular entertainment in both communities held mainly in the schools of Llanfihangel or Capel Seion. The whole community takes part in providing concerts, dramas, country dancing, Noson Llawen (light entertainments) & eisteddfodau. It mostly occurs from September to March & tends to be in Welsh. There are 3 {clubs}in Llanfihangel, a cricket club, Urdd Gobiath Cymru (Welsh league of youth) & Mothers Union. There are no other clubs in the block but the residents of the main road strip development attend the Urdd, Cwmdeithas Cwmraig (Welsh Society) & Womens Institute at the school in the centre of Capel Seion village in the adjacent block.
